TopicTitle: Cargo Bay Vibrations - Vehicle crashing down - Bugged

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I have an issue about cargo bays.

While designing the vehicle, there is no problem.

But when you "launch" the vehicle, before you are trying to do anything, it starts shaking by its own and disassembles.

Screenshot:

[http://imgur.com/MM93Pzf](http://imgur.com/MM93Pzf)

I have sent the craft file to " [\[email protected\]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#c1b2b4b1b1aeb3b581aaa4b3a3a0adb2b1a0a2a4b1b3aea6b3a0acefa2aeac) "

[\[email protected\]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)" adress.

Thanks in advance.

Hi Mubu, please see the support threads on reporting issues and submitting bugs, recreating your craft based on the picture did not result in any issue.

![0B1hHA0.png](http://i.imgur.com/0B1hHA0.png)

Mubu,

THere are weird interactions when other parts clip into the collision meshes of the service bays. It can sometimes cause the symptoms you are experiencing I would advise you be sure nothing is clipping into the bay very much, if at all. Try to not use offset to push stuff into the bay. If that still does not help you, come back and provide more detailed pictures of what is inside your bay.
